top_comments.comment: What was in Mirage's hand at 15:43?

“Don’t worry you won’t be able to farm abuse wildlife to upgrade your evo armor”
1:25 - 4:00

comments_since_last_sample.body: im just waiting for people to complain about the AI's messing with teams while being shot at. It just happened to me and its very annoying i gotta say lol. I suppose ill be avoiding those areas from now on. not that it matters when zone pushes you in to those areas. ugh what a way to end a good game D:
